DatabaseReader

public DatabaseReader()
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      FilePermissionException
Opens the three database files for reading.

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - If one of the database files are missing.
FilePermissionException - if permissions is missing to read the file

Initialize the Scanner-objects, so we can parse the databases. Used by any method that parses files. (e.g. findCourse )

findCourse

public Course findCourse(java.lang.String courseID)
                  throws CourseDoesNotExistException,
                         CritalCourseDataMissingException
Looks up a course using a Course ID and returns it with all the related data about the course.

Parameters:
courseID - The ID to look up.
Returns:
the Course (and related data).
Throws:
CourseDoesNotExistException - If the course does not exist
CritalCourseDataMissingException - If a critial part of the course data is missing (e.g. the "skema" data is missing)

Search through the Course data files for a pattern.

Parameters:

Returns:
